data.name: ExceptionCannotConnectLocal
data.value: A connection to the local database cannot be established. Verify that the local instance of SQL Server 2005 is running and that the name of the local computer has been correctly set in the configuration file.

data.name: ExceptionCannotConnectPublisher
data.value: A connection to the Publisher cannot be established. Verify network connectivity, that the Publisher is running, and that the name of the Publisher has been correctly set in the configuration file.

data.name: ExceptionContactTechSupport
data.value: Please verify that the publication has been configured properly and that the InstallSalesOrdersSample.bat batch file was executed.

data.name: ExceptionCouldNotReInit
data.value: The local sales data could not be reinitialized.

data.name: ExceptionFormValidation
data.value: You must fill in all fields when using Web sychronization.

data.name: ExceptionMergeAgentFailedInit
data.value: The Merge Agent failed to initialize the subscription.

data.name: ExceptionMergeAgentFailedSync
data.value: The Merge Agent failed to synchronize the subscription.

data.name: ExceptionProblemLocalData
data.value: There may be a problem with your local data.

data.name: ExceptionPropertiesNotRetrieved
data.value: The subscription properties could not be retrieved. Verify the configuration settings.

data.name: ExceptionPublicationNotRetrieved
data.value: Publication information could not be retrieved from the specified Publisher. Ensure that the Publisher is online and that you have the required system administrator login.

data.name: ExceptionSalesDataNotAvailable
data.value: The AdventureWorks sales data is not available for download.

data.name: ExceptionSqlServerError
data.value: SQL Server error

data.name: ExceptionSubscriptionNotCreated
data.value: The subscription could not be created. Verify that a valid username and password were provided.

data.name: ExceptionSubscriptionNotSync
data.value: The subscription could not be synchronized. Verify that the snapshot for the publication exists.

data.name: ExceptionUnexpectedSessionStatus
data.value: The application encountered an unexpected session status code"

data.name: ExceptionVerifySqlServerRunning
data.value: Please verify that the local instance of SQL Server 2005 is running.

data.name: HandlerFriendlyName
data.value: Custom Business Logic Handler

data.name: TellMeMoreLogin
data.value: This form is invoked by selecting Web Synchronization Options in the Advanced Options menu. It is used to manage Web synchronization settings for the subscription. Instead of managing these settings in the application, a MergePullSubscription object is used to store Web synchronization options in and retrieve Web synchronization options from the subscription metadata. In this sample, you must supply a Windows login and password that are passed to the Web server using HTTP Basic Authentication over a secure SSL connection. For more information, see the "Sample Considerations" section of "Sales Orders Sample Implementation Details" in Books Online for SQL Server 2005.
data.comment: From the User Interface Elements section in "Sales Orders Sample Implementation Details" in Books Online.

data.name: TellMeMoreWebSync
data.value: This form is used to manage Web synchronization settings for the subscription. Instead of managing these settings in the application, a MergePullSubscription object is used to store Web synchronization options in and retrieve Web synchronization options from the subscription metadata. In this sample, you must supply a Windows login and password that are passed to the Web server using HTTP Basic Authentication over a secure SSL connection. In an actual deployment, SQL Authentication credentials should be used instead of Windows credentials. For more information, see the "Sample Considerations" section of the "Sales Orders Sample Implementation Details" topic in Books Online for SQL Server 2005.
data.comment: From the User Interface Elements section in "Sales Orders Sample Implementation Details" in Books Online.
